scripts.setup: NODE_PATH=. npm run sass && npm run git-info && npm run sass-ie8
scripts.sass: NODE_PATH=. node-sass app/assets/sass/application.scss --output public/stylesheets --quiet --output-style expanded --source-map true --include-path node_modules/govuk_template_jinja/assets/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/govuk_frontend_toolkit/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/govuk-elements-sass/public/sass/
scripts.sass-ie8: NODE_PATH=. node-sass app/assets/sass/application-ie8.scss --output public/stylesheets --quiet --output-style expanded --source-map true --include-path node_modules/govuk_template_jinja/assets/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/govuk_frontend_toolkit/stylesheets --include-path node_modules/govuk-elements-sass/public/sass/
scripts.test:all: NODE_ENV=testing npm run test -- $@ && npm run test:mutation -- $@ && npm run test:component -- $@  && npm run test:smoke -- $@ && npm run test:functional -- $@ && npm run test:a11y -- $@
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=testing npm run test:unit -- $@ && npm run test:component -- $@
scripts.test:unit: NODE_ENV=testing NODE_PATH=. LOG_LEVEL=error mocha test/unit --reporter spec --recursive --timeout 10000
scripts.test:component: NODE_ENV=testing NODE_PATH=. LOG_LEVEL=error mocha test/component --reporter spec --recursive --timeout 10000
scripts.test:a11y: NODE_ENV=testing NODE_PATH=. LOG_LEVEL=error ENABLE_TRACKING=false mocha test/accessibility --timeout 30000 --exit
scripts.test:accessibility: NODE_ENV=testing NODE_PATH=. LOG_LEVEL=error ENABLE_TRACKING=false mocha test/accessibility --timeout 15000
scripts.test:codecov-upload: NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=. istanbul cover _mocha './test/**/test*.js' -- -R spec && codecov
scripts.test:mutation: npm run git-info && NODE_ENV=testing NODE_PATH=. stryker run test/mutation/mutation_unittests.conf.js
scripts.//: The below scripts are just stubs, don't use them in production
scripts.test-crossbrowser-e2e: NODE_ENV=testing LOG_LEVEL=OFF NODE_PATH=. node_modules/.bin/codeceptjs run-multiple ${BROWSER_GROUP:-'--all'} -c test/end-to-end/saucelabs.conf.js --steps --reporter mocha-multi
scripts.test:crossbrowser_chrome: NODE_PATH=. codeceptjs run-multiple chrome -c test/end-to-end/saucelabs.conf.js --plugins retryFailedStep --steps --reporter mocha-multi
